Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Randolph/ Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses rerouted Southbound buses will operate via Wacker & State. Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus & Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Randolph/ Stetson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker and State

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Laverne.
ShortDescription: in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta and Laramie then resume their normal route on Chicago Ave, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Laverne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Cicero, Augusta and Laramie then resume their normal route on Chicago Ave, due to fire department activity near Chicago/Laverne.

Allow extra travel time.
